description:
On libvirt the OS-EXT-SRV-ATTR:hypervisor_hostname extension always displays 'None':

We should implement get_hypervisor_hostname in the libvirt connection and make use of it to set 'hypervisor_hostname' so that this information is displayed correctly.
title: implement hypervisor_hostname extended SRV-ATTR for libvirt
